articles.title: Australia news LIVE: QR codes back in NSW as state records 5715 new COVID cases; Victoria considers changes to indoor mask rules as daily infections rise above 2000 - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: NSW continues to resist mask mandates in most indoor settings as coronavirus infections hit record highs, but will reintroduce QR codes in retail and hospitality settings. Meanwhile, Victoria is expected to outline changes to mask rules today.
articles.content:
The Victorian government has extended its mask mandate to all indoor settings and major events attracting at least 30,000 people.
